summary: This document is a summary of account balances and transactions for a Deutsche Bank account from February 1, 2017, to February 28, 2017. It details deposits, withdrawals, service charges, and interest payments, highlighting significant outgoing transfers and the ending balance.

persons.name: Steuart Oldfield
persons.context: Steuart Oldfield is mentioned as the contact for personal assistance regarding the account.

events.title: Outgoing Money Transfers
events.description: Two outgoing money transfers were made to Silicon Valley Bank totaling $1,350,000.

events.title: Cash Management Transfer
events.description: A cash management transfer of $2,000,000 was executed.

events.title: Interest Payment
events.description: An interest payment of $1,159.38 was credited to the account.

keyFacts: The account had a beginning balance of $5,609,179.75 on February 1, 2017.
The account experienced significant outgoing transfers totaling $1,350,000 on February 21, 2017.
A cash management transfer of $2,000,000 occurred on February 27, 2017.
The ending balance of the account as of February 28, 2017, was $2,110,339.13.
Steuart Oldfield is the contact person for account inquiries.
